members.name: target
members.doc: Where this link should open, supports _self and _blank or any name the user chooses. _self means same page, _blank means new page.

members.name: pageId
members.doc: The page id we want from the site

members.name: target
members.doc: Where this link should open, supports _self and _blank or any name the user chooses. _self means same page, _blank means new page.

members.name: anchorDataId
members.doc: The data id (from the JSON page) of the anchor that should be used

members.name: pageId
members.doc: The page id we want from the site

members.name: routerId
members.doc: The router that handles this link

members.name: anchorDataId
members.doc: The data id (from the JSON page) of the anchor that should be used

members.name: name
members.doc: The name of the document for download purposes

members.name: indexable
members.doc: If this document can be indexed by scrapers, default is false

members.name: recipient
members.doc: The email we will be sending a message to

members.name: phoneNumber
members.doc: The phone number we want to link to

members.name: address
members.doc: An address that we can link to

members.name: phoneNumber
members.doc: The whatsApp phone number we want to connect with

members.name: sortOrder
members.doc:
Item sort order.
Determines in which order items will be displayed in the gallery.
If you omit `sortOrder` when creating or updating an item, the field will be populated with the current timestamp.
The item will then be displayed at the end of the gallery.

members.name: link
members.doc: Link from the item. You can link to Wix sites or external URLs.

members.name: createdDate
members.doc: Item creation date and time in `yyyy-mm-ddThh:mm:ssZ` format.

members.name: updatedDate
members.doc: Date and time the item was last updated in `yyyy-mm-ddThh:mm:ssZ` format.

members.name: exif
members.doc: Whether the media file is in [Exchangeable Image File format](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Exif).

members.name: amount
members.doc: Unsharp masking amount. Controls the sharpening strength. Minimum 0, maximum 5.

members.name: radius
members.doc: Unsharp masking radius in pixels. Controls the sharpening width.

members.name: threshold
members.doc: Unsharp masking threshold. Controls how different neighboring pixels must be for shapening to apply. Minimum 0, maximum 1.

members.name: externalId
members.doc: External video ID. **Note:** This property is not validated by Wix.

members.name: default
members.doc: Whether it is a default thumbnail.

members.name: style
members.doc:
Set of key-value pairs describing the [CSS style](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/CSS) of the text.
__Note:__ The object structure is customizable. See the [List Gallery Items](https://dev.wix.com/api/rest/site-content/pro-gallery/list-gallery-items) code example for supported values.

members.name: editorHtml
members.doc: Editor HTML of the text. **Note:** For internal use only.

members.name: editorFontId
members.doc: Editor font ID of the text. **Note:** For internal use only.

members.name: target
members.doc: Whether the link will be opened in the same tab.

members.name: width
members.doc: Video width in pixels for this resolution.

members.name: height
members.doc: Video height in pixels for this resolution.

members.name: format
members.doc: Describes the format of the video, for example `Youtube`, or `Vimeo`.

docs.summary:
*
ProjectItem is the main entity of ProjectItemsService

members.name: projectId
members.doc: The ID of the project that the item is in

docs.summary:
*
Label is the main entity of LabelsService, it is used to label ProjectItems

members.name: paths
members.doc: The set of field mask paths.

members.name: totalSuccesses
members.doc: For how many items the requested action was successful

members.name: totalFailures
members.doc: For how many items the requested action was not successful

members.name: undetailedFailures
members.doc: total number of failures without details because detailed-failure-threshold exceeded

members.name: id
members.doc: Item id. Should always be provided, unless it's impossible (e.g when failing to create an item)

members.name: originalIndex
members.doc: The index of the item within the request array to allow the caller to correlate the request and response items

members.name: success
members.doc: Whether the action requested was successful for this item. When this value is false, error should be populated

members.name: error
members.doc: In case of failure, details about the error

members.name: cursor
members.doc:
Pointer to the next or previous page in the list of results.

You can get the relevant cursor token
from the `pagingMetadata` object in the previous call's response.
Not relevant for the first request.

members.name: count
members.doc: Number of items returned in the response.

members.name: total
members.doc: Total number of items that match the query. Returned if offset paging is used and the `tooManyToCount` flag is not set.

members.name: tooManyToCount
members.doc: Flag that indicates the server failed to calculate the `total` field.

members.name: cursors
members.doc: Cursors to navigate through the result pages using `next` and `prev`. Returned if cursor paging is used.

members.name: next
members.doc: Cursor pointing to next page in the list of results.

members.name: prev
members.doc: Cursor pointing to previous page in the list of results.

docs.summary:
Possible values are:
  • UNDEFINED
  • PHOTO
  • VIDEO
  • TEXT

Video source. Possible values are:
  • UNDEFINED
  • YOUTUBE
  • VIMEO
  • CUSTOM

Possible values are:
  • UNDEFINED
  • EXTERNAL - external link
  • INTERNAL - link to wix pages
